actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Government Operations.

official_title: A bill to amend section 552 of title 5, united States Code (known as the Freedom of Information Act), to provide for an in camera inspection by the appropriate court of certain agency records.
subjects: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues

summary.text: Authorizes, under the provisions of the Freedom of Information Act, an in camera inspection by the appropriate court of Government agency records sought to be classified by the agency under such Act's exemption provisions. (Amends 5 U.S.C. 552(a) 3)

titles.title: A bill to amend section 552 of title 5, united States Code (known as the Freedom of Information Act), to provide for an in camera inspection by the appropriate court of certain agency records.
